DTaP Vaccine.data-element: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for immunizations with diphtheria, tetanus, and pertussis (DTaP) vaccines.
DTaP Vaccine.incld: This value set may use a model element related to Immunization.
DTaP Vaccine.excld: Includes concepts that represent a diphtheria, tetanus, and pertussis (DTaP) vaccine.
